newsitem.title: UK: Cedel launches $1.0 bln revolving credit facility.
newsitem.headline: Cedel launches $1.0 bln revolving credit facility.

text.p: A $1.0 billion revolving credit facility was launched for Cedel Bank S.A., joint arrangers and bookrunners Citibank International and Union Bank of Switzerland said on Friday.

The facility will be for general corporate purposes, including standby liquidity, and replaces the $1.0 billion revolving credit facility arranged by Citibank and UBS in 1995 and extended in 1996, the statement said.
There is a 364-day maturity from the date of signing and a margin fee of 0.125 percent with a commitment fee of 0.05 percent.
The syndication will be on a restricted basis to Cedel Bank's relationship banks.
Cedel Bank is based in Luxembourg and is a supplier of clearing, settlement and custodial services.
